title: Laughs, Groans & Weiners
description:
Nayland Blake, Sarah Bell and Kevin Allison share stories about putting fondles on gnomes, hot dogs in vaginas and animal tranquilizer up nostrils.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Broke For Free, Sarah Bell, Kevin Allison, Nayland Blake, Stars)
